special_notes: Does NOT use the letter 'O'. Example tags: ON-PP4057, ON-PH7663. OMIT 'PRP'.

stacked_character_rules.position: OMIT 'PRP' stacked characters. Stacked characters must be keyed for other tags.
stacked_character_rules.notes: OMIT 'PRP' stacked characters. Stacked characters must be keyed for other tags.
